mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (category, user_id, title, content, image_url) VALUES (#{category}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl});
mapper.select: SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count FROM board GROUP BY category

SELECT b.category, b.title, u.nickname AS nickname, b.user_id, u.profile_image_path AS profileImageUrl, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, b.content, b.image_url FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{boardId}
SELECT id, category, user_id AS userId, title, content, image_url AS imageUrl FROM board WHERE id = #{boardId}

SELECT b.category, b.title, u.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id
AND (b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%'))
AND (b.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%'))
AND u.nickname = #{writer}
ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
